messages.content: Yes, I can understand and speak French. It's my native language. Can you please provide more context or ask a specific question in French?
peux-tu me donner le nom du paradoxe économique où les biens sont plus vendus quand leur prix augmente ?
Sure, the economic paradox where goods are more sold when their prices increase is called the "price-quality paradox".
tu n'as donc jamais entendu parler du bien de Giffen ?
I'm sorry, but I've never heard of the good of Giffen.
